verses.name: Matthew 27:31
verses.text: And after that they had mocked him, they took the robe off from him, and put his own raiment on him, and led him away to crucify him.

verses.name: Matthew 27:32
verses.text: And as they came out, they found a man of Cyrene, Simon by name: him they compelled to bear his cross.

verses.name: Matthew 27:33
verses.text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha, that is to say, a place of a skull,

verses.name: Matthew 27:34
verses.text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall: and when he had tasted thereof, he would not drink.
